channel.title: Muska(Under Construction)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc449/ForumSigMaker/To-media.gif[/img][/center]
Hello guys I am starting a new development(Muska) I finally gained the courage to actually begin a project because I am so lazy -.- This might be my last runescape private server. I want to be able to do bigger and better things and actually learn java.
Green Means it is finished and perfected. Orange means it is done and being tested. Yellow means it is being worked on. Red means it has not been started.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img]Melee - 2%
Correct maxhit formula corresponding to RuneScape. [color=orange]Realistic hit delays.[/color] [color=yellow]Perfect Dragon Claws "Slice and Dice" formula.[/color] Near Perfect blocking/attacking delays, no animation errors [color=orange] All special attacks on near perfect delays.[/color] Equipment bonus's & affects. (Barrows {Dharoks, Guthans, etc.}, Void{Mage,Melee,Range} Ring of Life, Ring of Recoil.) [color=orange]Proper animations for all weapons.[/color] Player poisoning which can be healed by a potion or a period of time.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img]Magic - 0%
Perfect Defensive Autocasting. Perfect Modern spell magics with Autocasting Perfect Ancient spell magics with Autocasting Nearly all Lunar spellbook spells work correctly. Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells. Correct RuneScape Teleportation. [Requires runes] Misc spells (Telekinetic grab, confuse, weaken) Perfect Teleblock, prayer will reduce time blocked.
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img]Range - 0%
Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe. All Bows (Including Crystal Bow, Seercull, etc.) function properly. All Cross bow's with proper affects. Nearly perfect max hit formula corresponding to RuneScape. Every bow special attack with the same effects as RuneScape. Perfect Dark Bow "Decent of Dragons" formula. (Maxhit: 56,56) Crystal bow degrading.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img]Prayer - 0%
Bone Burying. Dragon bones, big bones, and other bones with proper EXP rates. Bones on Alter for 2x EXP. Smite reduces opponents prayer by 25% of your damage. Combat prayers reduce the damage received by half.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving - 0%
Pickpocketing and stall thieving. Various items (fish,cakes) in correct stalls rather than coins. Npc's may catch you stealing from them and attack you. Npc's get protective and have a higher chance of catching another thief after being pickpocketing already. (Intelligent NPC) Level affects how often you're caught whilst stealing.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img]Slayer - 0%
The experience gained per monster is usually equal to 1/10 the monster's lifepoints. If more than one person is slaying the same monster, the experience is divided equally among or between them. Slayer tasks, all according to RuneScape. Seven Slayer masters, all with different difficulties of tasks.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img]RuneCrafting - 0%
Every normal rune alter functions properly with the requirement of a Talisman or Tiara. Working 'Locate' Talisman option. Fully function small, medium and large sized pouches. Exponential rune accumulation. (As you gain levels, you get more than one rune per essence.)
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img]Agility - 0%
Complete Gnome Stonghold Agility Course. Brimhaven Agility Arena. Wilderness Agility course. Barbarian Assult Agility course. Most Shortcuts configured properly. Tickets exchangeable for items/EXP a-like to RuneScape
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking - 0%
Most cook-able foods configured to cook properly on a range or fire. Food may burn. Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate. Cooking skill level affects burn rate. All cooking level requirements complete.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing - 0%
All Fish may be caught in the correct area with the correct equipment. Small/Big Nets fully functional. Harpoon fully functional. Lobster Pot fully functional. Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. Perfect Fishing Guild for advanced Fisherman. Correct fishing spot requirements. Slow, but worthy EXP rate.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img]Woodcutting - 0%
Woodcutting strings set to match current RuneScape Strings. Trees now turn to stumps after all the logs have been cut. The number of logs a tree holds is determined randomly from an array of reasonable amount values. Chopping noises are now enabled. Bird Nests now fall from trees and can be searched for valuable seeds and jewelery. Tree respawns vary based on the tree's output value. Better axes increase the rate at which you receive logs. (Dragon axe being the fastest) Every tree type choppable with proper log output and level requirements. Correct axe level requirements. Reasonable EXP rate.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img]Fletching - 0%
Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow fletching done via Interface. Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow). Crossbow and bolt assembly. Bow stringing.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking - 0%
All logs have proper requirements to be lit. All logs, including colored logs may be burned. All fires turn to ashes on correct timers. All players can see fires, and may cook food on them. Fairly fast EXP rate (as it doesn't give any income)
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img]Farming - 0%
Proper Farming formula and procedures used to fulfill farming tasks. All patches must be cleared with a Rake before being used. All Vegetable, Herb and Flower patches configured properly. All farming tools must be used with each corresponding task. Patches grow over a certain amount of time. (much shorter delay than RuneScape) Patches/trees give appropriate outputs for each corresponding seed grown and harvested.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img]Herblore - 0%
All level requirements. All herb identifications also stored in an array. All primary and secondary items as well as unf and finished potions stored in arrays. Perfect vial filling. (Selling vials of water to the general shop is decent profit) Perfect mixtures found on Herblore - The RuneScape Wiki - Skills, quests, guides, items, monsters and more Second ingredient grinding. Higher than average EXP rate, though much easier and less costly than RuneScape.
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img]Crafting - 0%
Misc. crafting such as Wool & flax spinning, hide tanning, clay crafting, etc. found on Crafting - The RuneScape Wiki - Skills, quests, guides, items, monsters and more . Perfect Gem Cutting. Perfect Jewelery crafting. Perfect Glass crafting.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img]Mining - 0%
Ore prospecting available for all ores. Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates. Various respawn delays based upon ores contained in rock. Gems found randomly whilst mining.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img]Smithing - 0%
Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface. Perfect metal forging, all item forgeries with correct bar/level requirements.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100722063540/runescape/images/a/ae/Bandos-godsword-inv.png[/img]GodWars - 0%
All dungeons with proper bosses/mini-bosses. NPC Killcount required to enter the dungeons. Bandos Alter revives prayer. General Graardor with speech. {"Break their bones!" & more} (Intelligent NPC) Proper drops from bosses {Godsword shards, Armadyl equipment, etc.}
Kalphite Queen - 0%
Kalphite Queen with range/mage/melee combat styles. Kalphite Queen casts dangerous spells, beware! (Intelligent NPC) Kalphite Guardians defending their queen.
King Black Dragon - 0%
Multi-combat area. Dragonfire breath, Shock breath, Ice breath, Poison breath. Proper drops, including the rare Draconic Visage.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100704154903/runescape/images/e/ef/CombatSwords.PNG[/img]Duel Arena - 0%
Secure staking system with no stake limits. All Duel Rules except Obstacles. Hint Icons.
Castle Wars - 0%
Saradomin & Zamorak teams. Guthix portal to even everything out. Waiting room, perfect game/wait timers.
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101028210760/runescape/images/d/d0/Fire_cape.PNG[/img]Fight Caves - 0%
Complete 63 Waves of Tzhaar Fight Caves. TzTok-Jad with proper mage/range to increase difficulty. Tokkul and Fire Cape reward once the Caves have been ruled. Fire Cape may only be worn Fight Caves has been completed.
Warriors Guild - 0%
A required combined Attack & Strength level of 120 to enter. Armour sets are worth the same amount of tickets as RuneScape. 10 Tickets vanish per minute a-like to RuneScape. Cyclops's drop defenders.
Barrows Tunnels - 0%
Exact chest rewards compared to RuneScape. After retrieving chest reward, an Earthquake erupts. All Barrows Bro's have correct combat bonus affects. Every tunnel door opens and closes properly.
[img]http://www.crackerjackpromotions.co.nz/images/common/icons/page_icons/balloon_shadow.gif[/img]Party Room - 60%
Working Lever. Part Pete with a count down timer. Dancing knights on the table. Balloons drop randomly around the room. Working chest.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101220233939/runescape/images/d/dc/Task_icon.png[/img] Achievement System - 43%
Make the base Saves Tasks An Alert box message every time a task is complete. Certain amount of 'Task Points' gained per task complete. [color=green]Turns yellow if it is started but not finished.[/color] 50+ Achievements.
Nazi Zombies - 0%
Picks Random 5 people from the group in the waiting area Start with nothing but a iron dagger. Gain points for each zombie killed Unlimited Waves. Waves get harder each time, and there is perks for each wave. Person dies and gets sent to a room with anyone else that dies. Mystery box in the room
Foraging - 0% All 10 tribes with tasks All resource spots functional Rewards system Rewards obtainable Obstacles all in play [color=green]Experience and leveling up[/color] Notes item added (like slayer gem to keep track of task) Skill tab interface Forage point system
[size=12pt]Media:[/size] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/1ngTSk.png[/img]
That should be it rate/hate/masturbate
Credits: Alex(r-s) Whoever made InsidiaX Sanity lmctruck
Supporters: zach55200
Beta Testers(Not going to be for awhile.): zach55200

item.title: Muska(Under Construction)
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[center][/center]

Hello guys I am starting a new development(Muska) I finally gained the courage to actually begin a project because I am so lazy -.- This might be my last runescape private server. I want to be able to do bigger and better things and actually learn java.

Green Means it is finished and perfected.
Orange means it is done and being tested.
Yellow means it is being worked on.
Red means it has not been started.

Melee - 2%

Correct maxhit formula corresponding to RuneScape.
[color=orange]Realistic hit delays.[/color]
[color=yellow]Perfect Dragon Claws "Slice and Dice" formula.[/color]
Near Perfect blocking/attacking delays, no animation errors

[color=orange] All special attacks on near perfect delays.[/color]
Equipment bonus’s & affects. (Barrows {Dharoks, Guthans, etc.}, Void{Mage,Melee,Range} Ring of Life, Ring of Recoil.)
[color=orange]Proper animations for all weapons.[/color]
Player poisoning which can be healed by a potion or a period of time.

Magic - 0%

Perfect Defensive Autocasting.
Perfect Modern spell magics with Autocasting
Perfect Ancient spell magics with Autocasting
Nearly all Lunar spellbook spells work correctly.
Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells.
Correct RuneScape Teleportation. [Requires runes]
Misc spells (Telekinetic grab, confuse, weaken)
Perfect Teleblock, prayer will reduce time blocked.

Range - 0%

Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe.
All Bows (Including Crystal Bow, Seercull, etc.) function properly.
All Cross bow's with proper affects.
Nearly perfect max hit formula corresponding to RuneScape.
Every bow special attack with the same effects as RuneScape.
Perfect Dark Bow "Decent of Dragons" formula. (Maxhit: 56,56)
Crystal bow degrading.

Prayer - 0%

Bone Burying.
Dragon bones, big bones, and other bones with proper EXP rates.
Bones on Alter for 2x EXP.
Smite reduces opponents prayer by 25% of your damage.
Combat prayers reduce the damage received by half.

Thieving - 0%

Pickpocketing and stall thieving.
Various items (fish,cakes) in correct stalls rather than coins.
Npc's may catch you stealing from them and attack you.
Npc's get protective and have a higher chance of catching another thief after being pickpocketing already. (Intelligent NPC)
Level affects how often you're caught whilst stealing.

Slayer - 0%

The experience gained per monster is usually equal to 1/10 the monster's lifepoints.
If more than one person is slaying the same monster, the experience is divided equally among or between them.
Slayer tasks, all according to RuneScape.
Seven Slayer masters, all with different difficulties of tasks.

RuneCrafting - 0%

Every normal rune alter functions properly with the requirement of a Talisman or Tiara.
Working 'Locate' Talisman option.
Fully function small, medium and large sized pouches.
Exponential rune accumulation. (As you gain levels, you get more than one rune per essence.)

Agility - 0%

Complete Gnome Stonghold Agility Course.
Brimhaven Agility Arena.
Wilderness Agility course.
Barbarian Assult Agility course.
Most Shortcuts configured properly.
Tickets exchangeable for items/EXP a-like to RuneScape

Cooking - 0%

Most cook-able foods configured to cook properly on a range or fire.
Food may burn.
Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate.
Cooking skill level affects burn rate.
All cooking level requirements complete.

Fishing - 0%

All Fish may be caught in the correct area with the correct equipment.
Small/Big Nets fully functional.
Harpoon fully functional.
Lobster Pot fully functional.
Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught.
Perfect Fishing Guild for advanced Fisherman.
Correct fishing spot requirements.
Slow, but worthy EXP rate.

Woodcutting - 0%

Woodcutting strings set to match current RuneScape Strings.
Trees now turn to stumps after all the logs have been cut.
The number of logs a tree holds is determined randomly from an array of reasonable amount values.
Chopping noises are now enabled.
Bird Nests now fall from trees and can be searched for valuable seeds and jewelery.
Tree respawns vary based on the tree's output value.
Better axes increase the rate at which you receive logs. (Dragon axe being the fastest)
Every tree type choppable with proper log output and level requirements.
Correct axe level requirements.
Reasonable EXP rate.

Fletching - 0%

Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow fletching done via Interface.
Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow).
Crossbow and bolt assembly.
Bow stringing.

Firemaking - 0%

All logs have proper requirements to be lit.
All logs, including colored logs may be burned.
All fires turn to ashes on correct timers.
All players can see fires, and may cook food on them.
Fairly fast EXP rate (as it doesn't give any income)

Farming - 0%

Proper Farming formula and procedures used to fulfill farming tasks.
All patches must be cleared with a Rake before being used.
All Vegetable, Herb and Flower patches configured properly.
All farming tools must be used with each corresponding task.
Patches grow over a certain amount of time. (much shorter delay than RuneScape)
Patches/trees give appropriate outputs for each corresponding seed
grown and harvested.

Herblore - 0%

All level requirements.
All herb identifications also stored in an array.
All primary and secondary items as well as unf and finished potions stored in arrays.
Perfect vial filling. (Selling vials of water to the general shop is decent profit)
Perfect mixtures found on Herblore - The RuneScape Wiki - Skills, quests, guides, items, monsters and more
Second ingredient grinding.
Higher than average EXP rate, though much easier and less costly than RuneScape.

Crafting - 0%

Misc. crafting such as Wool & flax spinning, hide tanning, clay crafting, etc. found on Crafting - The RuneScape Wiki -        Skills, quests, guides, items, monsters and more .
Perfect Gem Cutting.
Perfect Jewelery crafting.
Perfect Glass crafting.

Mining - 0%

Ore prospecting available for all ores.
Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates.
Various respawn delays based upon ores contained in rock.
Gems found randomly whilst mining.

Smithing - 0%

Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface.
Perfect metal forging, all item forgeries with correct bar/level requirements.

GodWars - 0%

All dungeons with proper bosses/mini-bosses.
NPC Killcount required to enter the dungeons.
Bandos Alter revives prayer.
General Graardor with speech. {"Break their bones!" & more} (Intelligent NPC)
Proper drops from bosses {Godsword shards, Armadyl equipment, etc.}

Kalphite Queen - 0%

Kalphite Queen with range/mage/melee combat styles.
Kalphite Queen casts dangerous spells, beware! (Intelligent NPC)
Kalphite Guardians defending their queen.

King Black Dragon - 0%

Multi-combat area.
Dragonfire breath, Shock breath, Ice breath, Poison breath.
Proper drops, including the rare Draconic Visage.

Duel Arena - 0%

Secure staking system with no stake limits.
All Duel Rules except Obstacles.
Hint Icons.

Castle Wars - 0%

Saradomin & Zamorak teams.
Guthix portal to even everything out.
Waiting room, perfect game/wait timers.

Fight Caves - 0%

Complete 63 Waves of Tzhaar Fight Caves.
TzTok-Jad with proper mage/range to increase difficulty.
Tokkul and Fire Cape reward once the Caves have been ruled.
Fire Cape may only be worn Fight Caves has been completed.

Warriors Guild - 0%

A required combined Attack & Strength level of 120 to enter.
Armour sets are worth the same amount of tickets as RuneScape.
10 Tickets vanish per minute a-like to RuneScape.
Cyclops's drop defenders.

Barrows Tunnels - 0%

Exact chest rewards compared to RuneScape.
After retrieving chest reward, an Earthquake erupts.
All Barrows Bro's have correct combat bonus affects.
Every tunnel door opens and closes properly.

Party Room - 60%

Working Lever.
Part Pete with a count down timer.
Dancing knights on the table.
Balloons drop randomly around the room.
Working chest.

Achievement System - 43%

Make the base
Saves Tasks
An Alert box message every time a task is complete.
Certain amount of 'Task Points' gained per task complete.
[color=green]Turns yellow if it is started but not finished.[/color]
50+ Achievements.

Nazi Zombies - 0%

Picks Random 5 people from the group in the waiting area
Start with nothing but a iron dagger.
Gain points for each zombie killed
Unlimited Waves.
Waves get harder each time, and there is perks for each wave.
Person dies and gets sent to a room with anyone else that dies.
Mystery box in the room

Foraging - 0%
All 10 tribes with tasks
All resource spots functional
Rewards system
Rewards obtainable
Obstacles all in play
[color=green]Experience and leveling up[/color]
Notes item added (like slayer gem to keep track of task)
Skill tab interface
Forage point system

[size=12pt]Media:[/size]

That should be it rate/hate/masturbate

Credits:
Alex(r-s)
Whoever made InsidiaX
Sanity
lmctruck

Supporters:
zach55200

Beta Testers(Not going to be for awhile.):
zach55200
